abstract: United States Olympic Committee denies report saying it recommended US athletes skip 2016 Rio Olympics because of Zika virus outbreak.
lead_paragraph: The United States Olympic Committee on Monday disputed a Reuters report saying the committee had advised United States athletes to reconsider competing in the Rio de Janeiro Games in August because of the Zika virus.

headline.main: U.S. Denies Telling Athletes to Reconsider Trips to Rio
headline.print_headline: U.S. Denies Telling Athletes to Reconsider Trips to Rio

snippet: The United States Olympic Committee on Monday disputed a Reuters report saying the committee had advised United States athletes to reconsider competing in the Rio de Janeiro Games in August because of the Zika virus.
